special_abilities.name: Special Equipment.
descriptions: Rath has a staff of fire, and scrolls of dimension door, feather fall, and fireball.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Rath is an 11th-level spellcaster who uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Rath has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): chromatic orb, color spray, mage armor, magic missile
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): chromatic orb, color spray, mage armor, magic missile

descriptions.raw: * 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, phantasmal force
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, phantasmal force

descriptions.raw: * 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, major image
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, major image
* 4th level (3 slots): confusion, greater invisibility
* 5th level (2 slots): mislead, seeming

actions.name: Quarterstaff.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Illusory Self (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest).
descriptions: When a creature Rath can see makes an attack roll against him, he can interpose an illusory duplicate between the attacker and him. The attack automatically misses Rath, then the illusion dissipates.
